metadata.title: CVE-2019-13568 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: CImg through 2.6.7 has a heap-based buffer overflow in _load_bmp in CImg.h because of erroneous memory allocation for a malformed BMP image.

criterions.comment: cimg package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.4+dfsg-1').
